title.rendered: Digiperform offers plenty of career options & prepares you for the work world – Ayushi Saraogi

content.rendered:
Hi Readers! Meet Digiperformer Ayushi Saraogi, a BBA graduate, and sassy YouTuber. Along with her YouTube channel, she is also working on various projects as a Freelancer. In a chit-chat session, she shared why she decided to learn digital marketing to enhance her YouTube skills and enrolled herself in dCDMC training at Digiperform.   Have a look!

Digiperform- It’s a pleasure to connect with you! Before heading further, we would like to know a bit about you.

Ayushi- I’m a BBA graduate and a certified Digital Marketer. After completing my advanced digital marketing training at Digiperform, I started my own YouTube channel “Supervising Shell“ and also been taking care of few marketing projects as a Freelancer.

Digiperform- What originally attracted you to choose digital marketing as your career?

Ayushi- Honestly speaking, I always had a curiosity to know more about online money making. On the other hand, lack of scope and opportunities in MBA program compelled me to drop my idea to enroll in an MBA program. Therefore, I decided to learn digital marketing which is trending and necessary for any business or company.

Digiperform- What exactly that makes us stand out from the competition & urge you to choose us over others?

Ayushi- I took demo class and realized that Digiperform had Great Mentors and amazing LMS content platform to learn digital marketing. The access is available 24X7 and trainers were quite reachable as well.

Digiperform- Tell us about your favorite experience you had with us, whether as a learner or as a customer?

Ayushi- The classes were very informative. Trainers were actually knowledgeable and it was really amazing to learn under their guidance.

Digiperform- Would you consider Digiperform as a trusted & reliable resource for Digital marketing training? Why?

Ayushi- Yes. Because it offers you plenty of career options & prepares you for the work world.

Digiperform- If you were to review our training program, what score would you give it out of 10?

Ayushi- 8 out of 10.

Digiperform- Where do you see yourself in the next 5 years?

Ayushi- Well, I’m not someone who can predict the future but definitely working towards building a better version of me.

Digiperform- If you had a piece of advice to someone just starting out, what would it be?

Ayushi- Just be focussed and follow your passion.

Digiperform- Finally, Describe Digiperform in one line.

Ayushi- Digiperform helps you to turn your career dreams into reality.   Thanks, Ayushi for choosing Digiperform as part of your career journey.
